page.title: 05Transport 1
page.content:
{ROADS} This area is well served by roads having the main A24 from London and Epsom to Leatherhead and then by way of the Mole Gap (A valley cut by the River Mole through the chalk of the North Downs) to Dorking and beyond. The A243 also crosses from North to South carrying a great deal of traffic from Kingston (and also London) to join up with the A24 at Leatherhead.
Smaller road cross from East to West giving the area easy access to these major roads and also the M25 motorway that circles London.
The common has several car parks so that people can easily enjoy the wild life and walks to be found there.
